casebody.data:
Matthew S. Lennon
v.
N.C. Department of Justice and The N.C. Department of Public Safety No. 204P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016. Mary-Ann Leon, Attorney at Law, Charles L. McLawhorn, Attorney at Law, Greenville, for Lennon, Matthew S. Vanessa N. Totten, Assistant Attorney General, for N.C. Department of Justice, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 24th of May 2016 by Petitioner in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016."
